txt.en: Doron is concerned that no action will be taken against the brigands which rob the Field of Celebrant and has implored you to defeat many of the wicked Men.

'Before you go, I have one more thing to ask of you. I have sent you to request the aid of the Horse-lords. Should they fail to move against these invaders, I demand that action be taken.\n\n'These wicked Men have invaded our land, and such indifference to their occupation is intolerable. Travel to the south and find them in their camp. Give them no quarter....'
The brigands have gathered to the south inside of a large camp known as Hordfierd.\n\nDoron has asked you to defeat many of the brigands which have invaded Parth Celebrant.

'It goes without my saying, but thank you for ridding us of those brigands. It is most unusual that an Oathbreaker would ask you to take action against anyone, much less someone deserving of our ire.\n\n'Our work is not yet finished...we must make the Field clear of these thieving roustabouts.'
Idmar is at his camp along the road in central Parth Celebrant.\n\nDoron sent you to speak with Idmar, following your attack upon the brigands.
'You should return to your captain, Idmar.'
